title: The age of the Silicon Valley ‘moonshot’ is over
description: Big Tech companies spent years pouring money into ambitious ideas like drone delivery and extending human life spans. Those days are over.

title: Remaking ‘Resident Evil 4’ was a huge challenge. The team was ready.
description: The fact is, the Resident Evil team has become very good at making Resident Evil games.

title: A grown-up’s guide to mastering TikTok
description: How to change your settings and tailor your algorithm to use the social media network like Gen Z.

title: ‘Noah’ and ‘Daren’ report good news about Venezuela. They’re deepfakes.
description: Researchers say the videos are part of Venezuelan leaders' attempts to spin the narrative on social media, one of the country's last bastions of free speech.

title: SpaceX launches another crew to space station for NASA
description: SpaceX has now successfully launched people into space nine times, including two launches that carried private citizens.
